directions: Cut herring fillets into small pieces and place in a bowl. Add yogurt, onion, pickled cucumber, mustard, black pepper, and sugar; mix well to combine.
Cover with plastic wrap and chill before serving so the flavors can develop, at least 3 hours.
ingredients: 1 pinch white sugar, or to taste
title: Sledzie w Jogurcie (Herring in Yogurt Dressing)
